elements.title: Folk Bitch Trio: ‘God's A Different Sword’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Folk Bitch Trio: ‘God's A Different Sword’

 Best New Music

The strongest link between the members of Melbourne’s Folk Bitch Trio , aside from their lifelong friendship, is music.

Sep. 5

elements.title: Rachael Yamagata: ‘Birds’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Rachael Yamagata: ‘Birds’

 Best New Music

It’s been roughly ten years since independent artist Rachael Yamagata put out a new studio album(!). Trust us, Starlit Alchemy (due October 3 via Julian Records) is worth the wait.

Sep. 4

elements.title: Jeb Loy Nichols: ‘Step In’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Jeb Loy Nichols: ‘Step In’

 Best New Music

Jeb Loy Nichols is on a lifelong journey through the roots of Americana, bringing his fresh perspective to the genre all along the way.

Sep. 3

elements.title: HAAi: ‘Hey!’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
HAAi: ‘Hey!’

 Best New Music

Producer, songwriter, and DJ HAAi is busy putting the finishing touches on her new album, HUMANiSE (due Oct. 10 via Mute).

Sep. 2

elements.title: Kurt Vile & Luke Roberts: ‘classic love’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Kurt Vile & Luke Roberts: ‘classic love’

 Best New Music

Indie rock hit maker Kurt Vile just dropped Classic Love, a new five-track EP made in collaboration with his Nashville-based pal Luke Roberts .

Sep. 1

elements.title: Sierra Ferrell: ‘A Lesson in Leavin'’ (feat. Nikki Lane) (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Sierra Ferrell: ‘A Lesson in Leavin'’ (feat. Nikki Lane)

 Best New Music

“A Lesson in Leavin’” had an impromptu debut at Stagecoach Festival earlier this year and was simply too good to abandon in the desert.

Aug. 29

elements.title: Blake Mills & Pino Palladino: ‘Taka’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Blake Mills & Pino Palladino: ‘Taka’

 Best New Music

What happens when you pair a great guitar player with a badass bassist?

Aug. 28

elements.title: Men I Trust: ‘Come Back Down’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
elements.contents:
Men I Trust: ‘Come Back Down’

 Best New Music

Men I Trust are winding their way through the USA on their biggest tour yet.

Aug. 27
